content.question: Frank Lloyd Wrightâ€™s decision to use cantilevered, reinforced concrete balconies in his design of Fallingwater allowed him to

choices.label: divide the interior of the house into distinctly separate spaces dedicated to specific functions
create a dynamic spatial interplay between the interior of the house and the surrounding landscape
dominate the surrounding landscape through the creation of monumental forms
ensure the structural integrity of the house in an area known for its seismic activity

content.answer: create a dynamic spatial interplay between the interior of the house and the surrounding landscape

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
